title: Fragment, 12th–13th century
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave
description: Unbleached plain weave cotton.  Design in red and dull brown (possibly faded purple), stylized branch with pointed leaves; curved stem alternates with two types of fleuron formed of flower heads in profile.  Remains of border in simple block pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 12th–13th century. Medium: cotton 
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave. 1959-105-7.
